body.description: TUMS Smoothies Extra Strength Antacid Chewable Tablets get to work in seconds, so you can forget your heartburn and get back to the moments that matter. TUMS extra strength chewable antacid tablets contain 750 mg of calcium carbonate to quickly and effectively fight heartburn and relieve sour stomach, acid indigestion and upset stomach associated with these symptoms. These smooth tasting and delicious fruit flavored antacid tablets neutralize acid on contact, giving you fast extra strength heartburn relief. Adults and children 12 years and older may chew two to four antacid chewable tablets as symptoms occur or as directed by a doctor. Known as a trusted brand to fight heartburn fast for 90 years, TUMS is America's number 1 antacid and the number 1 physician, pharmacist and OBGYN-recommended adult antacid brand. These TUMS antacid tablets come in a resealable bottle that is easy to take on the go in a purse or pocket so you're ready when heartburn strikes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-symptom relief: Treats Burning in Chest, Acid Indigestion, Sour Stomach and upset stomach associated with these symptoms. Trusted brand: America’s #1 Antacid** providing trusted heartburn relief for 90 years. TUMS goes to work in seconds by starting to neutralize acid on contact to bring fast and powerful heartburn relief. Active ingredients come from nature. Extra Strength TUMS are both kosher and gluten-free.

What are TUMS and how do they work? TUMS is an antacid used to relieve heartburn, sour stomach, acid indigestion, and upset stomach associated with these symptoms. TUMS starts to neutralize the heartburn-causing acid in your stomach on contact which provides fast relief for your tough heartburn. Many other heartburn medications are absorbed into the bloodstream and can take hours or day to fully work. Can you take TUMS while pregnant? If you experience heartburn during pregnancy, there are treatments your doctor can prescribe or recommend. TUMS is effective for occasional heartburn and TUMS is the #1 OB/GYN recommended brand of antacid.* The maximum daily dosage for Extra Strength is 6 tablets in 24 hours and for Ultra Strength is 5 tablets in 24 hours. Ask your doctor if TUMS and other options are appropriate for you. *IQVIA: Claim Substantiation Validation Statement. Calendar Year 2020. Do TUMS Expire? The expiration date is printed on the outside of the label. Do TUMS contain gluten or dairy? All TUMS products have been gluten tested and meet the guidelines for “gluten free.” TUMS Extra Strength, Ultra Strength, Sugar-Free and TUMS Smoothies are all dairy free. TUMS Chewy Delights contain dairy and TUMS Chewy Bites are manufactured at a plant that contains dairy.

Extra Strength Ultra Strength Naturals Ultra Strength Smoothies Extra Strength Sugar-free Extra Strength Chewy Bites Plus Gas Extra Strength Calcium Carbonate 750 mg 1000 mg 1000 mg 750 mg 750 mg 750 mg Goes to work in seconds ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ #1 OB/GYN recommended brand of antacid* ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Gluten Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dairy Free ✓ ✓ - ✓ ✓ - Kosher ✓ ✓ - ✓ ✓ - Specialty - - Free from artificial dyes and colors Instantly smooth, instantly fast Sugar-free Gas Relief Substantiation *IQVIA: Claim Substantiation Validation Statement. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great flavor and good value
reviews.reviewText: So I bought these and also the chewy tums. I have always used these and like them but wanted to try the chewy. You get a lot less in the chewy then these for the amount your paying and the taste isn’t great on the chewy ones.These are smooth tasting, and fast acting. I get relief with 15 min of taking. I would definitely recommend buying these for taste and value over the others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The smoothies taste better than the other types of Tums and this price is excellent. I appreciate being able to add these to my subscribe and save order

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and really effective!
reviews.reviewText: So easy in your mouth and going down your throat and into your TUMSy. They are not SIMPly effective, they are GREATly effective and my TUMSy thanks them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and the quantity and quality.
reviews.reviewText: Ordering more as the store always seems to be out of it. I love the size/quantity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like the texture of the TUMS smoothies, still feel slightly chalky, but much better than the original. At the end, it relieves heartburn rather quickly and the flavors are very pleasant. I do recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product, works every time and are safer then the garbage the doctors push on you.....
reviews.reviewText: We have been using Tums for years. They work every time and we can always trust them. They are a good value and safer then the garbage the doctors try to push on you that are dangerous and expensive. We highly recommend Tums, they work exactly as described on the label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for a good product
reviews.reviewText: Not much you can say about Tums. They work. The Smooties type are pleasant to chew, no chalkiness.
